settings.title: OUR AFTER-WATER WEAR EXPERIENCE
settings.content: The vacation towel couldn’t keep up with our  aquatic lifestyle anymore. It got soggy, smelly, and bulky after one use. It was time to change the way people dry.

settings.title: Smarter Terry
settings.content: Absorb Island terry is activated with our revolutionary Dri-Rite™ technology. Making it the first anti-odor, antimicrobial, dual-knit terry fabric with moisture-wicking finish that can speed up after-water dry times. Aubrie to provide language insight here for Dri-Rite Tech. What differentiates what Dri-Rite is from the Silvadur tech and moisture-wicking finish? Is it that the Dri-Rite tech is the all-encompassing tech that makes these elements function together within the fabric?

settings.title: Hygienic and Ultra-Durable
settings.content: We deeply understand the importance of freshness and durability when it comes to water-related activities. Our recycled yarns have built-in SILVADUR™ antimicrobial and anti-odor technology for advanced protection against bacteria, mustiness and fabric decay.

settings.title: Cooling Comfort
settings.content: Our moisture-wicking fabric accelerates the drying process by quickly drawing the moisture out from the inner layer to the fabric surface. Guaranteeing a cool, comfortable wear from the moment you throw us on.

settings.title: Absorb Island Vacations
settings.content: Our dual-knit terry with Dri-Rite technology is the first anti-odor, antimicrobial fabric with moisture-wicking finish to achieve optimal dry time. Quality and durability is at the forefront of our product.
